about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey with Choppa: Rescue Rivals, an action-packed, arcade-style helicopter rescue game designed for 1-4 players. Command your trusty choppers through a series of daring missions to save disaster victims from perilous situations. Experience the thrill of becoming an elite rescue chopper pilot in this high-octane adventure that takes you across the globe, from the frostbitten peaks of snowy mountains to the fiery chaos of an oil rig disaster, through dense, untamed jungles and across sun-scorched deserts.

Story

Your adventure kicks off with Rick Guyver, a legendary rescue chopper pilot coaxed out of retirement for one last, crucial mission on a disaster-ravaged oil rig. With his rescue pilot license freshly reinstated, Rick is thrust into an unexpected scuffle with Burdock, his former best friend turned adversary, uncovering a sinister plot led by the malevolent A.C.R foundation. As the stakes soar higher than ever, Rick and his comrades from the Thunderbolt Rescue Foundation must outwit and outmaneuver their foes to thwart Burdock's dark ambitions.

Choppa: Rescue Rivals offers a unique blend of chaotic gameplay, compelling storytelling, and cooperative rivalry. Prepare for an unforgettable ride to the skies where strategy and skill will determine the true heroes. So, gather your team and don't forget - it's time to get to the Choppa!

Key Features

  • Embark on an epic single-player story campaign: Navigate through a series of high-stakes rescue missions across the globe with a diverse cast of pilots.
  • Experience the thrill together: Dive into the chaos with couch co-op mode, allowing you and a friend to tackle the story campaign side by side.
  • Competitive local multiplayer: Engage in intense local multiplayer battles for up to 4 players, offering a high-flying twist on vehicular soccer action—this time in the sky with choppers!
  • Customization options: Personalize your gameplay by selecting from a variety of pilots and helicopters, and deck out your chopper with a wide array of stickers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

short_description: Take off with your trusty chopper in Choppa: Rescue Rivals, a thrilling arcade-style rescue adventure! Tackle daring missions solo or with a friend in co-op story mode, or face off in local multiplayer vehicular soccer. Save lives, outfly rivals, and become a hero in the skies!
